title: section 20(3) of the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 of 2021)
heading: 1. An tOrdú um Acht na dTeangacha Oifigiúla (Leasú), 2021 (Tosach
text_raw:
1. An tOrdú um Acht na dTeangacha Oifigiúla (Leasú), 2021 (Tosach 

Feidhme) (Uimh. 2), 2024 is teideal don Ordú seo.
text_norm: 1 tordu um acht na dteangacha oifigiula (leasu) 2021 (tosach feidhme) (uimh 2) 2024 teideal ordu seo

title: section 20(3) of the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 of 2021)
heading: 2. Ceaptar an 21ú lá de Nollaig 2024 mar an lá a thiocfaidh na forálacha seo
text_raw:
2. Ceaptar an 21ú lá de Nollaig 2024 mar an lá a thiocfaidh na forálacha seo 
a leanas de chuid Acht na dTeangacha Oifigiúla (Leasú), 2021 (Uimh. 49 de 
2021) i ngníomh: 

(a) 

alt 4; 

(b) 

alt 5; 

(c) 

alt 17; 

ARNA THABHAIRT faoi mo láimh, 
 12 Nollaig 2024 

TOMÁS Ó BROIN 
 Aire Stáit ag an Roinn Turasóireachta, Cultúir, Ealaíon, Gaeltachta, Spóirt 
agus Meán 

Foilsíodh fógra san “Iris Oifigiúil” an 13 Nollaig, 2024, á rá go 
ndearnadh an Ionstraim Reachtúil seo. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

[692] 3 

STATUTORY INSTRUMENTS. 

S.I. No. 692 of 2024 

________________ 

OFFICIAL LANGUAGES (AMENDMENT) ACT 2021 
(COMMENCEMENT) (NO. 2) ORDER 2024 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [692] 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

S.I. No. 692 of 2024 

OFFICIAL LANGUAGES (AMENDMENT) ACT 2021 
(COMMENCEMENT) (NO. 2) ORDER 2024 

I, THOMAS BYRNE, Minister of State at the Department of Tourism, Culture, 
Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, in exercise of the powers conferred on me by 
section 20(3) of the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 of 2021) 
and the Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media (Delegation of 
Ministerial Functions) Order 2024 (S.I. No. 253 of 2024), hereby order as 
follows:
text_norm: 2 ceaptar 21u la de nollaig 2024 mar la thiocfaidh na foralacha seo leanas de chuid acht na dteangacha oifigiula (leasu) 2021 (uimh 49 de 2021) ngniomh (a) alt 4 (b) alt 5 (c) alt 17 arna thabhairt faoi mo laimh 12 nollaig 2024 tomas broin aire stait ag roinn turasoireachta cultuir ealaion gaeltachta spoirt agus mean foilsiodh fogra san iris oifigiuil 13 nollaig 2024 ra go ndearnadh ionstraim reachtuil seo official translation tiontu oifigiuil 692 3 statutory instrument s.i no 692 2024 official language (amendment) act 2021 (commencement) (no 2) order 2024 4 692 official translation tiontu oifigiuil s.i no 692 2024 official language (amendment) act 2021 (commencement) (no 2) order 2024 thomas byrne minister state department tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium exercise power conferred section 20(3) official language (amendment) act 2021 (no 49 2021) tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium (delegation ministerial functions) order 2024 (s.i no 253 2024) hereby order follows

title: section 20(3) of the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 of 2021)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Official Languages (Amendment) Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 

2021 (Commencement) (No. 2) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited official language (amendment) act 2021 (commencement) (no 2) order 2024

title: section 20(3) of the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 of 2021)
heading: 2. The 21st day of December 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 21st day of December 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 
of 2021) shall come into operation: 

(a) 

section 4; 

(b) 

section 5; 

(c) 

section 17. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 12 December 2024 

THOMAS BYRNE 
 Minister of State at the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, 
Sport and Media 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in "Iris 
Oifigiúil" of 13th December, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [692] 5
